subAppInfo.subAppDescription: The Amazon scraping app extracts product information by providing a URL, retrieving the name, description, price, and image to simplify comparison and analysis of items.
The calculator app allows you to perform basic mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, with a simple and intuitive interface for quick calculations.
Get information about a random country using two different APIs.
The app simulates an e-shop, allowing users to browse products, add items to their cart, and place orders easily, providing a realistic online shopping experience.
The Hangman game app offers a word game where players must guess a word by suggesting letters while avoiding completing a drawing of a hangman.
Locate hidden mines on a grid while avoiding clicks on them, based on displayed numerical clues.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Dolorem optio in cum animi rerum quis? Dolor autem ad velit nihil a, debitis laboriosam voluptatibus voluptas quidem quae repellat, numquam libero!
The Tic-Tac-Toe game app allows users to play the famous tic-tac-toe game, where two players compete to align three symbols, offering a simple interface and options for solo or multiplayer play.
The app simulates rolling a 6-sided die, generating a random result between 1 and 6, ideal for games or to replace a physical die.
The Wordle game app presents a word challenge where players must guess a word in six attempts, receiving clues about the correct letters and their positions, promoting strategic thinking.

home.userDescription: I want to specialize in web development, particularly with React and Node.js. As a web developer, I have led three solutions from conception to deployment and completed several personal projects in React.js. I have strong skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, Git/GitHub, SQL, and PL/SQL, as well as the ability to turn user needs into concrete web solutions.
